# Data Utilities Examples

This folder contains examples for preparing and organizing time series data for modeling.

- [ts_data.md](ts_data.md) — Builds a `ts_data` object and explains its sliding-window structure (columns t{k}).
- [ts_projection.md](ts_projection.md) — Projects a `ts_data` object into input matrix (X) and target vector (y) for modeling.
- [ts_sample.md](ts_sample.md) — Splits `ts_data` into train/test while preserving time order and visualizes the split.
